People who are working as a DJ and looking for the quality DJ controllers and interfaces, then you can purchase well standard pioneer r1 universal DJ system. This is a professional wireless home DJ equipment that supports for diverse media and music formats like iPad, iPhone, and iPod with touch support. DJ can be used to operate various pieces of DJ software and automatically analyzed synchronizes the beats of songs that help easy song selection.
